p: The best-explored variable in the phase diagrams of the hybrid perovskites is temperature, with many phase changes with respect to temperature now known [ 4]. On the other hand, with the exception of the well-studied lead halide perovskite semiconductors [ 8– 10], relatively few structural studies of materials in this family under applied pressure have been reported [ 11– 13], although in some cases vibrational spectroscopy has intriguingly indicated structural changes [ 14, 15]. In particular, spectroscopic methods have revealed high-pressure changes in many metal formate hybrid perovskites [ 16– 21].
